nodes.bodyText: Do we not need this in Java because Java is handling map responses?
minor: please add a new line
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -553,3 +557,14 @@
         @end
     @end
 @end
+
+@private mapFieldPageStreamingAsserts(view, initCode)
+    @join line : initCode.lines
+        @if line.lineType == "MapInitLine"
+            @join mapEntry : line.initEntries on ","
+                $this->assertEquals(
+                    $expectedResponse->{@view.resourcesFieldGetterName}()[{@mapEntry.key}], ${@view.resourcesVarName}[{@mapEntry.key}]);
+            @end
+        @end
+    @end
+@end
